entry.title: Ordinals BIP PR
entry.summary:
The email begins with a dismissive tone towards a proposed "solution" that is believed to be unnecessary. The sender expresses the opinion that the problem being addressed by this solution does not actually exist. Furthermore, they criticize the proposed solution as being ineffective and suggest that it would be better to not have the solution at all. The current system in place is described as functioning well, apart from occasional disruptions caused by trolls.
The email does not provide any specific details about the proposed solution or the problem it aims to solve. Instead, it focuses on the sender's skepticism towards the necessity and effectiveness of the solution. The tone of the email suggests a negative view towards implementing the proposed solution.
